idea:
BESTBRAIN LEARNING PVT. LTD is a fastest growing K-12 Education Management Company providing solutions for private and government K-12 schools, coaching institutes

(JEE/NEET), students of K-12 segments, colleges, and non-profits globally. BB’s team of internationally recognized educational professionals and business specialists work world-wide with schools and business owners towards starting a school to overall improvement & development.

Our team has worked/developed with/more than 100 private schools internationally and provided customized ‘turn-key’ services for new and established school overall development. We are a team of passionate educational specialists that possesses over 20 years of experience in the fields of academics, administration, branding and operations in K-12 education domain. Our team dedicatedly works with individuals, societies, trusts, entrepreneurs & corporate to help them start new pre-schools, K-12 schools, learning center for k-12 students, Selling & Buying of Schools, School development and improvement Planning, School Management, School Supplies, School Branding , Marketing and other School related services.

BESTBRAIN LEARNING PVT. LTD provides the training for competitive and scholarship exam is promoted by Team of IIT/AIIMS/IIM Alumni professional Educationists which caters to IIT & Medical aspirants.

BESTBRAIN LEARNING PVT. LTD provides concept building Online /Classroom training for national level competitive /scholarship/ Board exams like NEET/ JEE Main / JEE Advanced /NTSE / KVPY/ OLYMPIAD & Foundation courses from class VI to XII for School exams.

We are committed to support high-impact organizations looking to transform education around the world and drive lasting, systemic change.

At BEST BRAIN, our ultimate goal and the foundation for everything we do is educational excellence.
name: BESTBRAIN LEARNING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Bienance Information Technology Pvt Ltd is a Fintech company and carries on the business of providing consultancy or IT related services, Management consultancy advisory services or any kind of assistance to any person, individual, company, firm, societies, institutions or associations or any kind of business entity for the purposes of long -term, short - term assistance and sets up online platform for the same. idea: I am working on a business plan that will create a learning platform for people wanting to pursue sports but do not have high means. This could be playing for fun in their local community tournament to becoming an International sports person. Entire curriculum will be a system driven approach not only to build skills but also mindset. I am working on a plan to create a virtual global university with the best coaches for all the sports played.
name: BestPrac
